narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mary Pellegrino is a Speech-Language Pathologist,   provider based in Tallahassee, FL. From 2019-02 through 2020-01, this provider received $232K in Medicaid payments across 3K claims serving 1K beneficiaries, billing 2 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 99% of all billing comes from a single procedure code: 92507 (92507). This extreme concentration is unusual and may indicate specialized services or a narrow billing pattern.
Billing stopped in 2020-01, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
